name: The Community Preschool, Grace Cathedral
description: The Community Preschool supports students and their families by providing a child-centered, inquiry-focused, play-based learning experience to an intentionally mixed socioeconomic group of children aged 3-5. Children must be able to use the bathroom independently and wear regular underwear. No diapers or “Pull-Ups”.
